CERTIFICATE_ERROR.TITLE: Connection not private
CERTIFICATE_ERROR.MESSAGE: This server could not prove that it is {{url}}; its security certificate is not trusted by your computer's operating system.
CERTIFICATE_ERROR.MESSAGE_REASON: This may be caused by a misconfiguration or an attacker intercepting your connection (attackers might be trying to steal your information).
CERTIFICATE_ERROR.REMEMBER_CAPTION: Remember selection and don't ask again.

CERTIFICATE_LIST.TITLE: Login
CERTIFICATE_LIST.MESSAGE: Select a certificate to authenticate yourself to {{url}}.
CERTIFICATE_LIST.REMEMBER_CAPTION: Remember selection and don't ask again.

CONNECTION_ERROR.TITLE: Connection error
CONNECTION_ERROR.RESOLUTION_1: Checking that the BMS server is running properly.

ENDPOINT.TITLE: Endpoint address
ENDPOINT.MESSAGE: Enter the address of a Flex Client application hosted on a {{brandName}} server.

UPDATE_INFO.TITLE: A new update is ready to install.
UPDATE_INFO.MESSAGE: {{appName}} version {{version}} has been downloaded and is ready for installation.
UPDATE_INFO.INSTALL_OPTION: Quit application and install the update now.
UPDATE_INFO.SNOOZE_OPTION: Snooze and remind me again in:
